name: Agnolita
description:
Game made for VIMJAM 2  in 10 days, i can't do all the things i would like to do within this time but i did my best, i hope you have fun!

You are Alicia, and your mission is to collect a rare type of ore called Agnomalia in the dangerous caves of Udronus. Walk in the edge of acid pools, take the five Agnolitas and get out of this place, cause your boss have more missions to you.

Select the CONTROL TYPE in the OPTIONS SCREEN. You can choose between "KEYBOARD A" (Arrow keys to move), "KEYBOARD B" (WASD to move) and JOYSTICK.

(KEYBOARD A)

  • MOVE: Arrow Keys
  • ATTACK: X
  • LOCK POSITION: Z
  • DODGE: C
  • PAUSE/MAP: Enter

(KEYBOARD B)

  • MOVE: W, A, S, D
  • ATTACK: Shift
  • LOCK POSITION: Ctrl
  • DODGE: Space
  • PAUSE/MAP: Enter

Game by Róger Goulart
